description.raw:
A two part system for subt for defining regions where gas is emitted and may be detected.

Part 1 is the definition of emitters. This is done via a world plugin where multiple bounding cubes may be specified where gases are being emitted. This specification is done through the size of a cube as well as it’s pose \(note that only cubes are supported at this time\)

Part 2 is the detector, which is a sensor plugin. When the detector is within one of these bounding cubes, it will publish a true detection. Detectors may additionally specify types, which will only respond to gasses in the space-separated list. If no type is specified, the detector will respond to all gas types.

‌
